sentences.en: A lengthy period of training is required.
sentences.cn: 需要很长一段时间的培训。

sentences.en: After lengthy talks the two sides finally reached a compromise .
sentences.cn: 双方经过长期的商谈终于达成了妥协。

sentences.en: An accident is causing some lengthy delays.
sentences.cn: 一起事故造成长时间的延误。

sentences.en: Gates responds with a lengthy discourse on deployment strategy.
sentences.cn: 盖茨以一篇有关部署策略的鸿篇大论予以回应。

sentences.en: Graham Fletcher was unimpressed with the idea of filling in a lengthy questionnaire.
sentences.cn: 格雷厄姆·弗莱彻对填写冗长的调查问卷这种事没什么兴趣。

sentences.en: Plasmas have shown themselves to be very resourceful at avoiding lengthy confinement.
sentences.cn: 等离子体本身在避免长度约束方面表现得很灵活多样.

sentences.en: Pulling out of a recession is a lengthy and drawn-out process.
sentences.cn: 从经济衰退中走出来需要漫长的过程。

sentences.en: The athlete could face a lengthy period of suspension if found guilty.
sentences.cn: 如果被判有罪,这名运动员可能面临长期停赛.

sentences.en: The book ends on a lengthy description of Hawaii.
sentences.cn: 这本书以对夏威夷的冗长描述为结尾。

sentences.en: The last stop in Mr Cook's lengthy tour was Paris.
sentences.cn: 库克先生漫长旅程中的最后一站是巴黎。

sentences.en: the lengthy process of obtaining a visa
The professor wrote a lengthy book on Napoleon.
sentences.cn: 教授写了一部有关拿破仑的巨著.

sentences.en: The reviewer padded out his review with a lengthy biography of the author.
sentences.cn: 评论者在他的评论中添加了冗长的作者生平以拉长篇幅。

sentences.en: There is a lengthy article on Spike Milligan in the Observer newspaper.
sentences.cn: 《观察家报》上有一篇关于斯派克·米利根的长篇文章。

sentences.en: They both made full recoveries after lengthy injury layoffs.
sentences.cn: 他俩因受伤长期休养后都已完全康复。

sentences.en: This is not the place for a lengthy discussion.
sentences.cn: 这会儿不是讨论个没完的时候。

sentences.en: This issue is so large and the process was so lengthy.
sentences.cn: 这个问题如此广泛,过程又如此漫长.

words.tran_cn: 长度，长；时间的长短；（语）音长

trans.tran_cn: 长的，漫长的，冗长的，啰唆的（演说，文章等）
trans.tran_en: continuing for a long time, often too long
